general.label: General configuration
general.comment:
The Feedback Company will sent you the Oauth2 details which can be filled in below.
If you haven't received the Oauth2 details you can request them manually by sending an e-mail tosupport@feedbackcompany.com.
As addition next to the activation of this extension we also recommend you to place the appropriate The Feedback Company logo.

cron.label: Use Cronjob
cron.tooltip: Use the Magento Cronjob to use the automatically import. A cronjob is a daemon which keeps running and gets activated at a said interval (time period). Please make sure your default Magento Cron is working. If not, contact your hosting company for help.

cron_stats.label: Update Summary
cron_stats.tooltip: Select the schedule for automatic updating

cron_reviews.label: Update Reviews
cron_reviews.tooltip: Select the schedule for automatic updating

cron_all.label: Update Review History
cron_all.tooltip: Select the schedule for automatic updating

sidebar.label: The Feedbackcompany Reviews Sidebar
sidebar.comment: Show the latest reviews directly in the right or left area of your store to gain trust and directly show your client reviews.

sidebar_note.label:
You can add this custom block by pasting the following code into your CMS page or Static Block.
{{block type="feedbackcompany/custom" name="feedbackcompany" blocktype="sidebar"}}

small_note.label:
You can add this custom block by pasting the following code in your CMS page or Static Block.
{{block type="feedbackcompany/custom" name="feedbackcompany" blocktype="small"}}

medium_note.label:
You can add this custom block by pasting the following code in your CMS page or Static Block.
{{block type="feedbackcompany/custom" name="feedbackcompany" blocktype="medium"}}

header_note.label: The documentation to implement The Feedback Company header widget can be found here.

overview.label: Feedbackcompany Overview Page
overview.comment:
You can import your customer reviews and display them in your store as new content.
Link: http://www.mywebshop.com/feedbackcompany

invitation.label: The Feedback Company Invitation Email
invitation.comment: You can invite your customers to write customer reviews.

enabled.label: Activate
enabled.tooltip: Send customers automatically receive an invitation to share a customer experience.

connector.label: Connector Code
connector.comment: Can be obtained from the Feedbackcompany Dashboard

status.label: Order completed with status
status.comment: Invitation e-mail is sent after such status is achieved
status.tooltip: Specify at which status you want to send the invitation. Default is "Completed"

delay.label: Delay
delay.comment: Send the invitation x days after the order is completed
delay.tooltip: This will ensure that the customer receives the invitation shortly after receiving the product and not before. This increases the opportunity that the client will share his experience.

remind_delay.label: Remind Delay
remind_delay.comment: Send the invitation reminder x days after the previous reminder. 0 = none

backlog.label: Maximum Delay
backlog.tooltip: Number of days to complete order may last, if it takes longer then no invitation will be sent. Read more about this feature on Feedbackcompany.nl.

resend.label: Resend if Double
resend.comment: If yes, customers will get new review reminders for every new order.

min_order_total.label: Minimum Order Total
min_order_total.comment: Invitation e-mail is sent only for order above this value. Use 0 for no minimum.

exclude_categories.label: Exclude following Categories
exclude_categories.comment: The invitation e-mail will not be sent whenever there is ordered a product from one of the selected categories.

products_note.label: This option is still in beta, contact The Feedback Company for more information.

cron_productreviews.label: Update Reviews
cron_productreviews.tooltip: Select the schedule for automatic updating

log.label: The Feedbackcompany Log Settings
log.comment:
Logs can be activated in order to detect errors.
This feature is particularly for developers.
